name: Andrew Heisler Designs and Consultation
tagline: A website by you, for you.
body:
### Welcome to my website.
I am a web designer/SEO consultant/Social Media Consultant who has 2+ years employed in the field, and 4+ in personal and freelance designing.

I employ modern web standards for the most pleasant viewing experience on all devices for a large majority of customers.

```
My skills
* HTML/CSS/JS
* Python
* PHP
* Photoshop/Illustrator
* .NET
* Microsoft Office 2010,2013
```
